frame.name: Temporary_group
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Temporary_group</fen> is formed from members of a <fen>Parent_organization</fen> for a particular <fen>Purpose</fen>. The <fen>Temporary_group</fen> does not exist independently within the <fen>Parent_organization</fen>. It is under the control of a <fen>Container_possessor</fen>, which also controls the <fen>Parent_organization</fen>.
<ex>They came upon another of Whipple's scouting parties, Under Lieutenant S.M. Rains, and wiped out the entire <fex name="mem">twelve-man</fex> <t><fex name="tem">detachment</fex></t>.</ex>
<ex>A <fex name="pur">guard</fex> <t><fex name="tem">detachment</fex></t> <fex name="par">from the Royal regiment</fex> was traveling with the main force to secure high-value prisoners.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Temporary_group
FE.definition:
<def-root>The group formed temporarily from a larger group for a particular purpose.
<ex>The Americans posted a small <t><fex name="tem">detachment</fex></t> to guard the facilities.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Members
FE.definition:
<def-root>The people belonging to the <fen>Temporary_group</fen>.
<ex>We were provided with a security <t>detail</t> <fex name="mem">of several soldiers</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition:
<def-root>The reason for which an <fen>Temporary_group</fen> is formed.
<ex>We've requested a large <fex name="Purpose">guard</fex> <t>detachment</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition: <def-root>A name given to the <fen>Temporary_group</fen> for identification.</def-root>

FE.name: Container_possessor
FE.definition:
<def-root>The location or political locale that the <fen>Temporary_group</fen> is contained within or is responsible to.
<ex>The <fex name="con">American</fex> <t>detachment</t> left at around midnight to begin the next round of patrols.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE describes the general location where the <fen>Temporary_group</fen> operates, but does not indicate the possessor of the <fen>Temporary_group</fen>.
<ex>A Marine <t>detail</t> in southern Greenland suddenly stopped communications.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the <fen>Temporary_group</fen> not covered by a more specific frame element.
<ex>Smith was part of a <fex name="des">small</fex> security <t>detail</t> tasked with the patients' safety.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Parent_organization
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Parent_organization</fen> is the larger group from which members are selected to be part of the <fen>Temporary_group</fen>.
<ex>A <t>detachment</t> <fex name="par">from the US military forces</fex> is due to arrive soon.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: detachment.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a portion of a military (or similar) organization separated and assigned a task.

lexUnit.name: detail.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a (often small) group temporarily set aside from a larger military or police organization for a set task.
